ability.Mind Surge: This Pokemon's Psychic-type moves have a 20% chance to confuse the target. If the target is already confused, damage from Psychic-type moves is doubled.
ability.Dark Aura: Raises the power of Dark-type moves by 33%.

Void Beam.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Nightmare Pulse.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Astral Gaze.effect: Raises the user's Special Attack and Speed by 1 stage.

Shadow Blast.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
